template.template: Template OS Windows CPU by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template OS Windows CPU by Zabbix agent

item.name: Load, %
item.key: wmi.get[root\cimv2,select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfformattedData_PerfOS_Processor where Name='_Total']

template.template: Template OS Windows Filesystems by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template OS Windows Filesystems by Zabbix agent

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in MACRO

template.template: Template OS Windows Inventory by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template OS Windows Inventory by Zabbix agent

template.template: Template OS Windows Memory by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template OS Windows Memory by Zabbix agent

template.template: Template OS Windows Network by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template OS Windows Network by Zabbix agent

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in MACRO

item_prototype.name: Interface: {#IFNAME}: Network carrier
item_prototype.key: wmi.get[root\cimv2,select NetConnectionStatus from win32_networkadapter where InterfaceIndex='{#IFINDEX}']

template.template: Template OS Windows by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template OS Windows by Zabbix agent
template.description:
Official Linux template. Requires agent of Zabbix 3.0.14, 3.4.5 and 4.0.0 or newer.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/384765-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-nginx
Template tooling version used: 0.22

item.host: Template OS Windows CPU by Zabbix agent

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows Inventory by Zabbix agent:system.uptime.last()}<10m
trigger.name: Host has been restarted (uptime < 10m)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. The device uptime is less than 10 minutes
